item.title: 10 Hugh Jackman Wolverine Movie Scenes That Have Aged Poorly
item.description: Hugh Jackman’s Wolverine has starred in some of the X-Men franchise’s most iconic scenes, but some scenes have not stood the test of time.

item.title: After Benedict Cumberbatch's Recent Avengers: Doomsday Comments, I'm Even More Excited For Avengers: Secret Wars Because Marvel Could Adapt The Story Right
item.description: While he won't be in Avengers 5, Benedict Cumberbatch's recent MCU comments about Doctor Strange make me even more excited for Avengers: Secret Wars.

item.title: I’m So Sad That 1 Batman Villain Who Is Truly Perfect For Christian Bale’s Batman Only Appears In The Dark Knight’s Secret Fourth Movie
item.description: The Christopher Nolan The Dark Knight trilogy is phenomenal, but I wish one other key villain had been included in the live-action movies.
